S.FORM: adup u kamu nu adup adup , u kamu nu Amilika: hunting aadupen miadup miadupay piadupan u zumazuma nu tinaku a kamu adup adup sa ku selal sa u makudusay a sizi. makudusay: u uzip nu tademaw atu aadupen, caykayadah ku titi, azihan tanuukak saan. aadupen i buyubuyu'an ku aadupen a mauzip. i bayubayuan ku buting a mauzip. miadup miadup kita u kapah ayza. lalimiadup ku kapah, tayza bayu' miadup atu mideteng. miadupay u miadupay ku acawa nu maku. u miadupay ku wawa nu maku, matineng miadup ku wawa atu acawa nu maku. piadupan u piadupan aku sa i nuzikuzan nina buyu'. nu makuay a piadupan itiza i nuzikuzan nina buyu'. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan http: e dictionary.apc.gov.tw Index.htm
